analysis.description:

UrbitToken.releaseVestedTokensFor has external calls inside a loop:

UrbitToken.releaseVestedTokensFor has external calls inside a loop:

UrbitToken.releasableBalanceOf has external calls inside a loop:

TokenVesting.vestedAmount (/unique_contracts/0x931684139f756c24ec0731e9f74fe50e5548ddef.sol#427-443) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < cliff (/unique_contracts/0x931684139f756c24ec0731e9f74fe50e5548ddef.sol#437-443)
	- block.timestamp >= start.add(duration) || revoked[token] (/unique_contracts/0x931684139f756c24ec0731e9f74fe50e5548ddef.sol#439-443)

PresaleTokenVesting.vestedAmount (/unique_contracts/0x931684139f756c24ec0731e9f74fe50e5548ddef.sol#450-477) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= duration.add(saleClosedTime) (/unique_contracts/0x931684139f756c24ec0731e9f74fe50e5548ddef.sol#463-477)

UrbitToken.saleClosed (/unique_contracts/0x931684139f756c24ec0731e9f74fe50e5548ddef.sol#649-650) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (saleClosedTimestamp > 0) (/unique_contracts/0x931684139f756c24ec0731e9f74fe50e5548ddef.sol#650)
